title: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society
title_en: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society
title_jp: 攻殻機動隊 STAND ALONE COMPLEX Solid State Society
synopsis: A.D. 2034. It has been two years since Motoko Kusanagi left Section 9. Togusa is now the new leader of the team, that has considerably increased its appointed personnel. The expanded new Section 9 confronts a rash of complicated incidents, and investigations reveal that an ultra-wizard hacker named the Puppeteer is behind the entire series of events.
